mapper.select: SELECT ord.ord_cd "ord_cd " , ord.prog_cd , ord.req_dt , ord.res_dt , ordtl.prod_cd , ordtl.ord_qty , vdr.vdr_nm , pd.prod_nm , cd.cd_explan FROM ORDERS ord, VENDOR vdr, ORD_DTL ordtl, PROD pd, COMM_CODE cd WHERE ord.vdr_cd = vdr.vdr_cd AND ord.ord_cd = ordtl.ord_cd AND ordtl.prod_cd = pd.prod_cd AND cd.comm_cd = ord.prog_cd
